title: Sunlight Capture
description: Solar panels capture sunlight and convert it into direct current (DC) electricity.

title: Inverter Conversion
description: The DC electricity is converted to alternating current (AC) using an inverter for home or grid use.

title: Power Distribution
description: The converted AC electricity powers your home appliances or is fed to the local power grid.

title: Battery Storage
description: Excess energy is stored in batteries for use during night or cloudy days.

title: Monitoring System
description: Smart monitoring helps track energy production and consumption in real-time.

title: Grid Integration
description: Solar energy can be exported to the local power grid, reducing electricity bills.

title: Maintenance & Support
description: Regular maintenance ensures maximum efficiency and long-term performance.

title: Eco-Friendly Impact
description: Using solar energy reduces carbon footprint and promotes a sustainable future.
